sn_aia_tool.description: Adds the client's assets to an existing account closure request using as inputs: - request_number: The number of the current account closure request. - client_assets: A JSON array of product objects. Each object must include: - number: The asset number (e.g., "06 010 00 0000022") - description: A short label for the product (e.g., "Zurich Bank Conto Welcome") - type: The product type (e.g., "current_account", "policy", "loan")
sn_aia_tool.name: Add Client's Asset to the Request
sn_aia_tool.sys_name: Add Client's Asset to the Request
